column2: The Chrysanthemum Throne is finally mine, and so is all the power and authority that comes with it.
I guess I have a regent. For now...
Banzai! Banzai! Banzai!
I have finally become the [Root.GetTitle], and all the power and authority of the position now belongs to me. Unfortunately, this power and authority is not as vast as it could be.
I guess I have a regent. For now...

I have finally succeeded [FromFrom.GetBestName], and all the power and authority that belonged to [FromFrom.GetHerHim] now belongs to me. Unfortunately, this power and authority is not as vast as it could be.
I guess I have a regent. For now...

It seems [From.GetBestName] has leveraged [From.GetHerHis] considerable influence at court to secure more power for [From.GetHerselfHimself] at my expense. Sadly, I am in no position to oppose this for the time being.
[From.GetSheHeCap] forgets [From.GetHerHis] place...

Even though there are many in [From.GetBestName]'s court that are well aware that it is in the interest of the realm for me to have rather considerable authority it seems [From.GetBestName] has still managed to leverage [From.GetHerHis] influence to somewhat reduce my authority.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is perhaps not content as a puppet...

[Root.GetBestName]
It is clear to me that it would be best for the realm if I personally held [target_title.GetName], and I have taken the necessary steps to ensure that this indeed is the case.

By my hand and seal,
[meddling_character.GetBestName]
I am in no position to oppose this...

[Root.GetBestName]
It is clear to me that the realm would be better served by [target_vassal.GetBestName] being my direct vassal, and I have taken the necessary steps to ensure that this indeed is the case.

By my hand and seal,
[meddling_character.GetBestName]
I am in no position to oppose this...

[Root.GetBestName]
It is clear to me that the realm is better served by you being my direct vassal, and I have taken the necessary steps to ensure that this is indeed the case.

By my hand and seal,
[meddling_character.GetBestName]
I suppose that's fine...
I have a bad feeling about this...

[meddling_character.GetBestName] has come to the conclusion that some of my wealth would be better in [meddling_character.GetHerHis] hands. [meddling_character.GetSheHeCap] claims that [meddling_character.GetSheHe] will be spending it in a fashion that will benefit the realm, but I have my doubts that that is the truth.
[meddling_character.GetSheHeCap] is just a common thief!

[meddling_character.GetBestName] came to see me today and wasted no time before informing me that [meddling_character.GetSheHe] thinks it would be best for the realm if I spent the next year far, far away from government affairs. [meddling_character.GetSheHeCap] also let me know that [meddling_character.GetSheHe] has seen fit to assign me a large number of guards to ensure everything goes as planned.
I... have no choice...

[Root.GetBestName]
I have decided that it would be in the interest of the realm for you to marry [new_spouse.GetBestName]. I have taken the liberty of ensuring that the wedding can take place immediately.

By my hand and seal,
[meddling_character.GetBestName]
I guess I have a new wife...
I have just received word that [meddling_character.GetBestName] has seen fit to release [prisoner_to_release.GetBestName] from prison, supposedly acting in my name.
[meddling_character.GetSheHeCap] didn't even ask me!
I have just received word that [meddling_character.GetBestName] has seen fit to execute one of my prisoners, [prisoner_to_execute.GetBestName], supposedly acting in my name.
[meddling_character.GetSheHeCap] didn't even ask me!

It seems [meddling_character.GetBestName] has decided that [voter_to_fire.GetBestName] being on my council is not to [meddling_character.GetHerHis] liking, as [meddling_character.GetSheHe] has let [voter_to_fire.GetBestName] know that [voter_to_fire.GetHerHis] presence no longer is desired.
At least [voter_to_fire.GetBestName] does not blame me...

I have just been informed by [meddling_character.GetBestName] that I am not welcome at any more council meetings for the time being, supposedly because the realm would benefit more from someone else in my old position.
This wasn't [Root.Liege.GetBestName]'s idea!

[Root.GetBestName],
It is apparent to everyone that you currently are unfit to serve as the Permanent Regent, and everyone agrees that I should serve in your stead. I am sure you will see things my way, at least in time.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetBestName]
I'll remember this!

[Root.GetBestName],
I am pleased to inform you that our combined efforts have paid off. I am now the Permanent Regent for [Root.Liege.GetBestName], and my tenure will continue indefinitely, for the good of the realm.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetBestName]
Excellent!

[Root.GetBestName],
Your former Permanent Regent was obviously unfit to serve, so I have taken the liberty to take over the Permanent Regency. For the good of the realm, this state of things will of course continue indefinitely.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetBestName]
I suppose this is no worse...

[Root.GetBestName],
The time has come to end the Permanent Regency. I ask that you step aside willingly, but you should know I am prepared to compel you by force of arms should it prove necessary.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetBestName]
I suppose I should step aside...
I won't back down without a fight!

[Root.GetBestName],
I agree that the time has come for the Permanent Regency to be ended, and I will step aside willingly to prove my loyalty to you.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetBestName]
Assuming direct control!

[Root.GetBestName],
The Permanent Regency is in the interest of the realm as a whole, and if you seek to end it by force of arms I have no choice but to fight back.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetBestName]
Then prepare for war!

[Root.GetBestName],
The time has come to end the Permanent Regency. I ask that you step aside willingly, but you should know I am prepared to compel you by force of arms should it prove necessary.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetBestName]

[Root.GetBestName],
[FromFrom.Liege.GetBestName] has requested the end of the Permanent Regency, and though I know you were prepared to support me against [FromFrom.GetHerHim] I have decided that the realm would not benefit from a civil war and have stepped aside.

By my hand and seal,
[From.GetBestName]
